response.overview: Girls' Generation embarked on their fourth tour Phantasia at the Olympic Gymnastics Arena in Seoul on November 21 and 22, 2015. Composed of different distinct themes, the concert fully exhibited the girls' unique characters. Apart from hit songs, the group also performed the songs from their fifth album Lion Heart. The live release also features the concert's making video. Nakasone Rino, who has worked with superstars like Britney Spears and Justin Bieber, served as the show's choreographer.
response.title: Girls` Generation 4th Tour [Phantasia] in Seoul
